TANVEER RAZA 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Operations Head 
I am a self-motivated, meticulous and result-oriented individual working in the online travel industry with 
consolidator handling in Operation Management, Product Development, Marketing Strategy, Hotel Management 
and Digital Marketing Strategy. Proficient at managing & leading team for running successful operations. 
 
 
Seeking a career to utilize my knowledge, personal skills to gain comprehensive understanding of a reputed 
organization, so as to take responsibility and contributes significantly. Objective to work in an organization which 
provides opportunities for growth, learning and scope of for the implementation of my skills and hence give my best 
to the organization.

ADB Rooms Pvt. Ltd. 
New Delhi

Identify key markets and the types of hotel products that would complement our current product offerings 
and revenue growth. 
 
Handling hotel partner objections by clarifying, emphasizing agreements and working through differences to 
a positive conclusion. 
 
Resolving client issues and complaints. 
 
Building relationships with new as well as existing hotel partner and market manager of OTAs. 
 
Managing & leading team for running successful operations. 
 
Develop and implement tasks and processes analytically to drive hotels to potential growth opportunities. 
 
Submitting weekly progress reports and ensuring data is accurate.
